page.title: 05ENGLISH CHINA CLAY (cont)
page.content: Par has 11 berths each one up to 76.2 metres (250 feet) in length. One of these berths was specifically built for oil deliveries. The port can accommodate vessels of over 1500 tonnes, although most vessels are less than 1000 tonnes. The port dries out and cannot be used at at low tide. Up to 1000000 (1 million) tonnes of cargo are loaded every year, with 1800 vessels passing through the port of Par every 12 months. { }Lorries and trains are also used to transport the clay from the clayworks to Par. { {HOW CHINA CLAY IS USED China clay is used in the making of paper, which is by far its largest use. It is used as a filler for the small surfaces between the pulp fibre.
